title: Ervin Laszlo: We Are in the Midst of a Global Transformation (pt. 1 of 2)
itunes:title: Ervin Laszlo: We Are in the Midst of a Global Transformation (pt. 1 of 2)
description: Prolific author and philosopher Ervin Laszlo discusses his most recent books, in which he outlines how the latest discoveries in science converge with spiritual insights and point to the ways in which society might evolve in ways that will help overcome contemporary crises.
